email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Shanghai. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this cargo? We are looking for a laycan around mid-November.

Best regards,
John Doe
Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN QUEEN, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m, for your shipment. The laycan is 15th-20th November. Our starting freight quote is USD 25 per MT on a CIF basis.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
Chartering Ltd

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Could you consider reducing it to USD 23 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can adjust the freight rate to USD 24 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 6,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

USD 24 per MT and a demurrage rate of USD 6,000 per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the laycan of 15th-20th November.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Emily
